key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on third-party foundries in Asia
Intense competition from larger players like AMD and Intel
Market volatility and cyclicality in the semiconductor industry
Technological challenges requiring continuous R&D investment
Legal and intellectual property risks, including past patent disputes
controversies: Workforce reductions, including a 14% layoff in response to profit and sales slumps
Past patent disputes, such as the settlement with Intellectual Ventures in 2013
environmental_issues: Commitment to sustainability initiatives, including improving energy efficiency
social_issues: Impact of workforce reductions on employee morale and operational efficiency
governance_issues: Management of financial resources amid R&D and innovation demands
